name: Organic bath bomb / Valentine's Day / conversation
description:
These bath bombs make the cutest gifts or treat for Valentine's Day!

They ore organic and colored with clays and herbs. They come single or as a set. Message varies from heart to heart, your heart may not say exactly what is in the photo. If ordered as a set you will not have duplicate messages.

Simply draw your bath and get in alone or with someone you fancy for a pampering and relaxing treat.


Ingredients: non-gmo citric acid, sodium bicarbonate, Moroccan pink clay, French green clay, turmeric, activated charcoal, white kaolin clay, jojoba oil, witch hazel extract*, Rose absolute.
